entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
